title: Why does nobody get Boots of Swiftness?
body:
I mean, I get that they don't give you the pure combat stats of, well, any other boot option, but they give you something more valuable.

Slow reduction.

Red buff adcs become a lot more manageable and kiting you is a lot more of a chore than Braum pressing R and laughing his way to the bank with assist money.

So seriously, why does nobody use Boots of Swiftness? Is it because they're lacking in combat stats, something else entirely, or a combination of the two?
